metadata.title: CVE-2019-7314 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
liblivemedia in Live555 before 2019.02.03 mishandles the termination of anRTSP stream after RTP/RTCP-over-RTSP has been set up, which could lead to aUse-After-Free error that causes the RTSP server to crash (Segmentationfault) or possibly have unspecified other impact.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-7314` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libbasicusageenvironment1 - 2018.02.18-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
libgroupsock8 - 2018.02.18-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
liblivemedia62 - 2018.02.18-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
libusageenvironment3 - 2018.02.18-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
livemedia-utils - 2018.02.18-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: liblivemedia package in esm-apps/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2018.02.18-1ubuntu0.1~esm1').
